metadata.title: CVE-2023-52561 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:arm64: dts: qcom: sdm845-db845c: Mark cont splash memory region as reservedAdding a reserved memory region for the framebuffer memory(the splash memory region set up by the bootloader).It fixes a kernel panic (arm-smmu: Unhandled context faultat this particular memory region) reported on DB845c runningv5.10.y.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
